articles.author: Sharmila Bhadoria
articles.title: Info Edge applications Naukri, 99acres back on Play Store, founder Sanjeev Bikhchandani says ‘People were up all night’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Info Edge's applications Naukri, 99acres and Shiksha are back on Play Store, a day after the tech giant took action against multiple Indian app developers in dispute over fee payment
articles.content:
Info Edge applications Naukri, 99acres, and Naukrigulf have been reinstated by Google India on Play Store, company founder Sanjeev Bikhchandani said on Saturday.
 Applauding the team to contain the … [+2999 chars]

articles.title: MWC 2024 Is Over but Here's the Wildest Tech You Can Buy Now - CNET
articles.description: Score the latest in mobile technology from the 2024 Mobile World Congress without the wait.
articles.content: This year's Mobile World Congress event wrapped up yesterday, closing out a week packed with a ton of exciting new tech. MWC 2024 ran from Feb. 26 through Feb. 29 in Barcelona, Spain. The long-runnin… [+24430 chars]
